description:
Music Theory for Beat Makers is a quick crash course that teaches the principles of music theory to music producers and beat makers in an easy to understand format.

After completing the course you will have a great understanding of all the notes on the piano, both half steps and whole steps, and will know several formulas to play scales & chords.

You will now be able to play music that you hear in your head or even just make your beats sound more musical without having to sample or spend hours trying to learn on your own!

Enroll Today!
title: Music Theory For Beat Makers 1
